items.title: Ronald Koeman junior kent zijn plaats: 'Roefs is wel een grote meneer'
items.summary: De naam van Ronald Koeman junior zal altijd onlosmakelijk verbonden blijven aan die van zijn vader, de bondscoach. De doelman van Telstar ging in op de geruchten dat hij mee zou moeten naar het WK als derde doelman, maar hij kent zijn plek maar al te goed.

items.title: Taylor twee dagen na transfer direct in de basis bij Lazio
items.summary: Kenneth Taylor staat zondagavond direct in de basis bij zijn nieuwe club Lazio. De 23-jarige middenvelder maakte vrijdag de overstap van Ajax en staat twee dagen later op het middenveld tegen Hellas Verona.

items.title: Are 'efficient' Chelsea ready to chase down titles?
items.summary: Having won the last six Women's Super League titles, Chelsea have not had to chase for a while. But they are up for the challenge this time.

items.title: Portsmouth 1-4 Arsenal: FA Cup third round ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Updates from the FA Cup tie kicking off at 2pm GMT ‚öΩ Live scores | Sign up for Football Daily | Email Daniel At Pride Park, Leeds have come from behind to lead Derby. They‚Äôre playing with so much confidence now they‚Äôre setting up in a 3-5-2. Bad news for Liverpool: Continue reading...

items.title: VI Live: Man Utd stuit op Brighton in FA Cup, Sparta leidt
items.summary: Welkom in de VI Live op deze ijskoude zondag 11 januari. Volg hier de ontwikkelingen binnen en buiten de grenzen, met op deze plek onder meer aandacht voor de Eredivisie, de finale van de Super Cup tussen Barcelona en Real Madrid en het FA Cup-toernooi.

items.title: Manchester United v Brighton: FA Cup third round ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Updates from the FA Cup tie kicking off at 4.30pm GMT ‚öΩ Live scores | Sign up for Football Daily here Gabriel Martinelli‚Äôs hat-trick gave Arsenal a 4-1 win at Portsmouth in their third round tie. Daniel Harris was watching that game. Kobbie Mainoo starts for the first time since the Carabao Cup defeat to Grimsby in August. He replaces Casemiro in one of three changes from Man Utd‚Äôs draw at Burnley. Mason Mount and Leny Yoro come in for Luke Shaw and Ayden Heaven, with Patrick Dorgu moving from right wing to left-back. Darren Fletcher‚Äôs sons, Jack and Tyler, are on the bench. Continue reading...

items.title: Milan ontsnapt in blessuretijd aan dure nederlaag bij Fiorentina
items.summary: Fiorentina heeft AC Milan zondagmiddag duur puntenverlies toegediend in de jacht op de Scudetto. De nummer twee van de Serie A hield echter in extremis nog wel een punt over aan het duel in Florence, terwijl het leek af te stevenen op een nederlaag.

items.title: Martinelli scores hat-trick as Arsenal see off Pompey
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli responded to his recent criticism by scoring a hat-trick for Arsenal in their 4-1 comeback win over Portsmouth to reach the FA Cup fourth round.

items.title: Regeer wil het op zijn manier doen: 'Geen nieuwe Henderson'
items.summary: Youri Regeer begon in het duel met Telstar op de nummer 6-positie, een plek waar Ajax in deze transferperiode maar al te graag nog een versterking ziet komen. Hij viel ook nog geblesseerd uit, maar dat lijkt mee te vallen.

items.title: Martinelli hat-trick as Arsenal beat Portsmouth in FA Cup
items.summary: Gabriel Martinelli scored a hat-trick as Arsenal overcame an early scare to thrash Championship strugglers Portsmouth 4-1 in the FA Cup third round.

items.title: Liverpool's Bradley out for season with knee injury
items.summary: Liverpool defender Conor Bradley is set to miss the rest of the season after suffering a serious knee injury in Thursday's 0-0 draw with Arsenal.

items.title: USMNT's Pepi suffers broken arm scoring for PSV
items.summary: United States striker Ricardo Pepi suffered a broken forearm while in action for PSV Eindhoven on Saturday and and is set to be sidelined for two months, the Dutch club has confirmed..

items.title: Salah scores to set up AFCON reunion with Man√©
items.summary: Mohamed Salah scored his fourth goal of the Africa Cup of Nations as Egypt defeated defending champions Ivory Coast 3-2 in Agadir.

items.title: Supercopa Clasico preview, predictions: Are Barcelona favorites vs. Real Madrid?
items.summary: Barcelona and Real Madrid meet in the Supercopa final Sunday, but who has the upper hand? Sam Marsden and Alex Kirkland preview the upcoming Clasico.

items.title: Leeds avoid upset with second-half comeback against Derby
items.summary: James Justin scored his first goal for Leeds United since joining from Leicester City in the summer, in a second-half comeback after Derby County took the lead thanks to a Ben Brereton Diaz strike.

items.title: Man Utd latest: Mainoo starts, Shaw not in squad for FA Cup tie
Humiliating FA Cup loss leaves Crystal Palace and Oliver Glasner at crossroads
items.summary: After Macclesfield defeat, club must invest wisely to bolster a weak squad and convince their manager to stay Oliver Glasner‚Äôs face told the story. The Crystal Palace manager watched in exasperation as the FA Cup holders headed towards ignominy on Macclesfield‚Äôs artificial surface and was still in shock when he conducted his post-match interview. ‚ÄúHonestly, I have no explanation for what I have seen today,‚Äù said Glasner. A mere 238 days since the greatest day in Palace‚Äôs history, when he and the club stalwart Joel Ward paraded their first major trophy at Wembley, Marc Gu√©hi‚Äôs first thought after the final whistle at the weekend was to face the music from the diehards who had made the trip to Cheshire from south London. Accompanied by the assistant manager, Paddy McCarthy, the Palace captain held intense discussions with several supporters as Macclesfield‚Äôs celebrated their historic victory with a pitch invasion. Continue reading...

items.title: Gnonto and Tanaka turn tie on its head as Leeds knock Derby out of FA Cup
items.summary: Daniel Farke had no need to channel Marcel Bielsa and send any spies to watch Derby train this past week to know that, even with eight changes to his starting XI, his Leeds squad had more than enough Premier League class to overcome mid-table Championship opposition. Goals from the fringe players Wilfried Gnonto, Ao Tanaka and James Justin enabled Leeds to bounce back from their dramatic 4-3 defeat at Newcastle and overturn Ben Brereton D√≠az‚Äôs first-half goal. Leeds have lost just once in nine games now and, as well as an eight-point buffer from the relegation zone, can now countenance the prospect of an FA Cup run. With all the history surrounding this midday kick-off, it was a tame opening half-hour before Leeds upped the intensity to earn the chance to go ahead. Even with their much-changed lineup, the running off the ball and incision of passing of the Premier League side suggested an opening goal was incoming. The fact it then went to Derby only accelerated the adrenaline. Continue reading...

items.title: Second-half turnaround helps Leeds overcome Derby in FA Cup
items.summary: Two goals in four second-half minutes helped a much-changed Leeds United come from behind to beat Derby County 3-1 at Pride Park to book their place in the FA Cup fourth round.

items.title: Rangers sign Chukwuani as midfielder becomes R√∂hl‚Äôs first arrival
items.summary: Rangers have signed Tochi Chukwuani from Austrian side Sturm Graz as the midfielder becomes Danny R√∂hl‚Äôs first signing.
